decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Preliminary Ecological Appraisal Rev A; Arboricultural Survey and Impact Assessment (RT-MME-126765-03 Rev.B); School Travel Plan Addendum (2671/062/006);; Educational Needs Assessment; Planning Statement; P3D_Green School_Isleworth Rev R1 (Garage and Admin, drawing no. 10/26; Garage and Admin rear, drawing no. 11/26; Modular Classroom, drawing no.5/26; Bike Shelter, drawing no. 22/26; Modular Classroom, drawing no. 7/26; Modular Classroom, drawing no. 6/26; Garages and Admin, drawing no. 1/3; Modular Admin, drawing no. 3/3); E00557-hNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P210 Rev A; E00557-HNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P115 Rev B; E00557-HNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P101 Rev B; E557-TF-00-ZZ-DR-L-1002 P02; E00557-HNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P119 Rev B; E00557-HNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P110 Rev B; Sports Provision and Facilities Sharing Statement; Preliminary Bat Roost Assessment; Archaeological Desk Based Assessment; Air Quality Assessment; Design and Access Statement; Site Noise Survey and Feasibility; Heritage Statement; Cycle Environment Review System (CERS); Pedestrian Environment Review System (PERS); Received 29/03/2018; Transport Statement; 17/05/2018; Construction Logistics Plan; Received 26/06/2018; CAD Parking details; GSB-AWP-ZZ-XX-DR-S-0501; Received 04/07/2018.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The relocated classroom shall be removed by 20 July 2021 and the land it is placed on shall be grassed and kept open after that date.

Condition : 5 - Before the development hereby permitted commences at the site, tree protection measures in line with hereby approved Arboricultural Survey and Impact Assessment shall be undertaken at the site and shall be retained for the entire period of the duration of any work at the site.

Condition : 6 - Within two years of this decision, four native species of trees, between 100mm and 120mm in girth shall be planted within the site complying the requirements specified in BS 3936-1 (Nursery Stock Specification for Trees and Shrubs) and in BS 4428 (1989) (Recommendations for General Landscape Operations). None of the new trees planted shall be lopped or topped within a period of five years from the planting and within if the trees die, removed or become seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced within five years from the planting same specifications.

Condition : 7 - The relocating of the existing 18 cycle parking spaces, as shown on drawing number E00557-HNW-ZZ-ZZ-DR-A-P119 Rev B, shall be completed prior to the start of the 2018-19 school year and retained thereafter for the lifetime of the development.
Condition : 8 - No more than 65 car parking spaces shall be provided within the site as approved under this planning consent.

Condition : 9 - The temporary construction vehicle access on London Road shall be removed and the footway made good prior to the occupation of the enlarged school building that forms part of the associated planning application (planning reference 00707/AJ/P28).
description: Demolition of two existing garages and one modular administration building. Temporary relocation of one existing modular classroom and one cycle shelter. Erection of temporary construction hoardings and formation of new temporary construction vehicle access. Reconfiguration of car parking spaces and formation of a new emergency vehicle access from Quakers Lane.
